mapper.insert: insert into SV04 (seq, seq01, parents, text, userid, regdate) values (SEQ_SV04.NEXTVAL, #{seq01}, #{parents}, #{text}, #{userid}, #{regdate})
mapper.select: select T.* ,(select count(*) from SV04 s2 where s2.seq01 = T.seq01 and s2.parents = T.seq ) as reply from (select /*+ INDEX_DESC(SV04 IDX_SV04_1)*/ rownum as rown, seq as seq, seq01 as seq01, text as text, userid as userid, regdate as regdate, good as good from SV04 where seq01 = #{seq01} and parents = 0 and rownum <= #{endRownum} ) T where T.rown >= #{startRownum}

select /*+ INDEX_DESC(SV04 IDX_SV04_1)*/ rownum as rown, seq as seq, seq01 as seq01, text as text, userid as userid, regdate as regdate, good as good from SV04 where seq01 = #{seq01} and parents = #{parents}
select /*+ INDEX_FFS(SV04 IDX_SV04_1)*/ count(*) as totCnt from SV04 where seq01 = #{seq01} and parents = 0
select seq as seq, userid as userid from SV04 where seq = #{seq}
